basics.name: Arnaud JOYE
basics.label: SOAT
basics.summary: As a seasoned software engineer, I specialize in comprehensive testing and application development. My strength lies in designing and implementing RESTful APIs, a skill that enhances system connectivity and improves user experience. Adhering to Agile methodologies and 'Clean Architecture' principles, I assure maintainability and scalability of systems. My adaptability and teamwork aptitude equip me well for any software engineering role.

projects.name: wa-batch-DateTimeOriginal
projects.description: Developed a batch processing application to efficiently manage and manipulate large volumes of date-time data. The application specifically targets the issue of lost EXIF DateTimeOriginal data during Whatsapp image restoration, ensuring the proper display of images by their original date in viewing tools.
highlights: Designed and implemented core functionality, including the extraction of date and time information from filenames and injection into EXIF as DateTimeOriginal
Optimized the application for handling and processing large volumes of data
Worked primarily with TypeScript and JavaScript for development
Ensured the application is capable of handling specific file naming conventions and formats
projects.summary: The wa-batch-DateTimeOriginal is a TypeScript-based batch processing application specifically designed to handle large volumes of date-time data. As the lead developer, I was responsible for designing and implementing the core functionality, as well as optimizing the application for performance and scalability.

projects.name: hominem
projects.description: Hominem is a Gridsome-based, minimalistic blog platform showcasing a clean and user-friendly design. The web application is responsive and maintains high code quality standards, with an emphasis on user experience.
highlights: Developed a responsive, user-centric web application using Gridsome, a Vue.js-based static site generator for building fast, optimized websites.
Implemented and maintained high code quality standards, including the use of linters and code formatting tools.
Integrated Docker for web serving, enhancing the project's deployment capabilities.
Incorporated advanced features such as internationalization and a commenting system using Vssue.
projects.summary: Hominem is a user-centric web application built using cutting-edge web technologies such as Vue.js and Gridsome. The project demonstrates my advanced skills in web application development, my commitment to delivering high-quality, user-focused products, and my ability to integrate modern tools and practices such as Docker and Vssue into my workflow.

projects.name: OCRmyDIR
projects.description: An early-stage project potentially involving optical character recognition (OCR) technology.
highlights: Initial development stage
Possibly involves OCR technology
projects.summary: OCRmyDIR is a project at its initial development stage. The project potentially involves the application of OCR technology, though further details are currently not available as it is still in the early stages of development.

work.name: SCIPOVO - Service Development
work.description: Co-founded a technology startup focused on innovative service development
work.summary: Co-founded SCIPOVO, a tech startup focusing on innovative service development including a diet management app for Europe and a B2B time slot booking service for Central America.
highlights: Optimized application architecture for cost efficiency and future scalability, with a focus on API-centric design
Developed robust backends and user-friendly frontends, enhancing system efficiency with a product-centric approach
Established strategic partnerships, expanding business reach and opportunities
keywords: Cross-platform Web MacOS Windows Android iOS

work.name: OODRIVE - French techn
work.description: Software Architecture, API Management & Software Development
work.summary: Served in 3 teams, participating in architecture decision, enhancing API management and implementing robust software solutions. Supported the transition to off-the-shelf billing systems and build an automated rule engines. Collaboratively worked towards a microservices architecture using DDD and SOA.
highlights: Aligned technical and business infrastructure with strategic objectives
Initiated API best practices and trained teams
Evaluated potential API Management solutions through extensive POCs and benchmarks
Implemented an automated rule engine, optimizing process workflows
Create automated processes for upsale validation, improving operational efficiency for the billing department
Contributed to the provision of a containerized technical platform, bolstering system scalability

work.name: Société Générale BDDF - ERPM
work.company: Société Générale BDDF / Crédit du Nord
work.summary: Participated in the development of a robust, multi-platform application named ERPM for Crédit du Nord's Digital Agency to optimize customer acquisition. The application, leveraging features like API-driven data interchange, improved client management by interfacing with the central system through a SOA.
highlights: Guidance on technology selection, development of an multi-platform app, corrective and adaptive maintenance
Integrated deployment tools (Maven, Git, Jenkins, Nexus, Alien4Cloud, EKL stack) and REST APIs for BFF operations.
Managed Scrum lifecycle events and maintained software quality with testing, code review and pair-programming practices.

work.name: Mairie de Paris - Equipe transverse à la DSIN
work.summary: Directed the overhaul of a municipal management application, improving transparency, efficiency, and team skills with Kanban and pair programming practices.
highlights: Revamped project objectives and automated code review for quality assurance
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for efficient development cycles
Boosted team skills and autonomy using Agile Kanban and pair programming

work.name: SMA BTP - MOREP
work.summary: Worked as a Software Development Engineer at SMA BTP, where I contributed to developing and improving financial management tools. Our key project was the MOREP reference tool for SMA's financial statements, utilizing Spring and AngularJS.
highlights: Assisted in establishing the technical foundation and developing robust Spring web-services
Participated in creating AngularJS interfaces and conducting user-requirement studies
Worked on database interactions and participated in release management activities

work.name: Eutelsat S.A. - Media
work.summary: Worked in a team to design and implement satellite telecommunication services. Participed in Mule ESB RESTful web services and Java modules development.
highlights: Assisted in laying down the project's technical groundwork and developing basic web services
Helped manage database interactions and participated in the development of new modules
Involved in client demos, sprint planning, and contribution to technical documentation

work.name: Société Générale BDDF - Portiques
work.summary: Participated in the enhancement and management of Société Générale's portal for associations, individuals, professionals, and businesses stakeholders. Assisted in developing tools for new transfer types and worked on the maintenance and migration of application portals for compatibility with Weblogic 11g.
highlights: Executed user needs analysis and UI design
Developed Web Services using Spring and managed database interactions
Led unit testing and release management activities
Handled production deployment and technical support

work.name: Infotel - Equipe R&D
work.summary: As a Software Development Engineer Intern at Infotel, I spearheaded the conceptualization and development of innovative applications. My work included designing a comprehensive account management application for CROUS and a collaborative internal social network for Infotel.
highlights: Assisted in technical studies and setup SOAP services for app development
Contributed to the POC for mobile and desktop solutions using hybrid technology
Supported database interactions and customer support

publications.name: Débloquer la puissance des APIs: Un guide de gestion et d'outils d'API
publications.summary: In this publication, I explored the importance of API Management. Drawing an analogy with an orchestra's maestro, I explained how API Management ensures that all APIs are properly configured and performing their assigned tasks efficiently.

publications.name: OpenAI et n8n : le duo de choc de l'hyperautomatisation
publications.summary: In this article, I discussed the powerful combination of OpenAI and n8n for hyperautomation. I highlighted how these tailored automation tools can be effectively utilized for blog writing and other tasks.

volunteer.summary: Led and oversaw the operations and management of a property, ensuring efficient operation and tenant satisfaction.
highlights: Guided the decision-making process for property operations.
Liaised between property owners and tenants.
Managed conflict resolution and problem-solving.

volunteer.summary: Oversaw administrative functions of the organization, providing effective communication and organization.
highlights: Managed meeting schedules, minutes, and correspondence.
Ensured smooth operations of the organization.
Contributed to strategic decision-making.

certificates.name: MongoDB M101J - MongoDB for Java Developers
certificates.summary: Earned a certificate in MongoDB for Java developers. Covered topics include setting up a MongoDB environment, CRUD operations, data modeling, and database management.

meta.note: This is a combined version of the old and new JSON Resume API to provide maximum compatibility. You will notice duplicated values in different fields.
